name: Noleg
description:
A man sets out on an adventure on his own two legs, except he is missing his legs.

Created for UT Game Jam 2020 with the theme: Something's missing.

Play as a legless guy named Noleg as he fights off waves of foes, how long can you survive???

- Left click to grapple

- Spacebar to attack

- Time survived at the top left, life left at the top right.
